translation.en: Wasted days and wasted nights
translation.zh: 挥霍的日子 虚度的岁月

translation.en: I have left for you behind
translation.zh: 我不得不默默离去

translation.en: For you don't belong to me
translation.zh: 因为你不属于我

translation.en: Your heart belongs
translation.zh: 你的心已

translation.en: To someone else
translation.zh: 让别人占有

translation.en: Why should I keep loving you
translation.zh: 为什么我仍然爱着你

translation.en: When I know that you're not true?
translation.zh: 虽然我知道你不忠

translation.en: And why should I call your name
translation.zh: 为什么我要唤你的名字

translation.en: When you're to blame For making me blue?
translation.zh: 即使是你令我难过

translation.en: Welcome to Singapore, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们 欢迎来到新加坡

translation.en: and to all Singaporeans and residents of Singapore,
translation.zh: 并对所有新加坡公民和居民说声

translation.en: a warm welcome home.
translation.zh: 欢迎回国

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: You record this, okay? Later you put at where?
translation.zh: 你在为谁录影？你要在哪里播放？

translation.en: Arts Central? At what time?
translation.zh: 中央艺术电台？什么时候播放？

translation.en: Next year?
translation.zh: 明年？

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便吧

translation.en: Now, starting the "Skaters' Waltz".
translation.zh: 现在演奏《溜冰者华尔兹舞曲》

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Your attention, please. For your own safety, please stand behind the yellow line.
translation.zh: 请注意 为了您的安全 请站在黄线后面

translation.en: How did you know Mum?
translation.zh: 你怎么认识妈妈的？

translation.en: Happy birthday to you
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Happy birthday to you
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Happy birthday, dear Mom
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐 亲爱的妈妈

translation.en: Happy birthday to you
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Now, you have to blow it.
translation.zh: 好了 吹蜡烛吧

translation.en: Mom, you have to make a wish. Make a wish before you blow out the last two. Make a wish to yourself.
translation.zh: 吹蜡烛之前给自己许个愿吧 妈妈

translation.en: I wish I'll be free from aches and pains.
translation.zh: 我希望身体不会有任何病痛

translation.en: Wait. Now, blow out those two.
translation.zh: 等等 好了 吹灭剩下两支蜡烛

translation.en: I have always felt myself a Singaporean, even though I live in New York.
translation.zh: 虽然我住在纽约 我一直把自己当作是新加坡人

translation.en: I am both a New Yorker and Singaporean in equal parts.
translation.zh: 我是纽约人又是新加坡人 两部分均等

translation.en: I first performed "4'33"" in Singapore at the Arts Festival.
translation.zh: 我首次在新加坡表演《4分33秒》

translation.en: I think this was back in 1991.
translation.zh: 是在1991年的新加坡艺术节

translation.en: There was a gentleman who was so indignant and insulted by this experience
translation.zh: 有一位先生因为无声的表演 而感到不耐烦又觉受辱

translation.en: of having to sit in the concert hall with nothing happening,
translation.zh: 而感到不耐烦又觉受辱

translation.en: that he left the auditorium and slammed the door behind him,
translation.zh: 而感到不耐烦又觉受辱 结果愤怒地离开礼堂 还把门大声地关上

translation.en: which was absolutely perfect.
translation.zh: 实在太棒了

translation.en: And then, a decade later, I performed "4'33"" again in Singapore,
translation.zh: 十年后 我再次回新加坡 表演《4分33秒》

translation.en: and I was so welcomed back this time.
translation.zh: 这时我非常受欢迎

translation.en: Whereas the first time the critic, you know, really lambasted me.
translation.zh: 首次表演时受到评论家的不好评论

translation.en: So, it was a real homecoming.
translation.zh: 所以这次的反应 确实给我带来回到老家的感觉

translation.en: They were literally lining up to have CDs purchased and autographed.
translation.zh: 观众排着队购买光碟和要求我签名

translation.en: And we did this for close to an hour, and we sold about 50 CDs,
translation.zh: 观众排着队购买光碟和要求我签名 我在将近一个小时内 售卖了大约50张光碟

translation.en: and I signed them all personally.
translation.zh: 全都是我亲笔签名的

translation.en: I recently had the great privilege of performing a 75th birthday tribute
translation.zh: 去年11月 我很荣幸有机会 为乔治克蓝伯的

translation.en: to George Crumb at Carnegie Hall this past November.
translation.zh: 75岁大寿 在卡内基音乐厅表演

translation.en: I felt very, very privileged that the New York Times'
translation.zh: 《纽约时报》的艺术篇

translation.en: Weekend Arts section gave me the cover slot…
translation.zh: 《纽约时报》的艺术篇 给我封面介绍

translation.en: …as a teaser for the article inside, which…
translation.zh: 令我感到很感激

translation.en: I got a rave review in the New York Times.
translation.zh: 《纽约时报》给了我一个好评

translation.en: How does it feel now, to be welcomed?
translation.zh: 现在受人欢迎的感觉如何？

translation.en: It warms the cockles of my ageing heart.
translation.zh: 确实令我老化的心倍感温暖

translation.en: One dollar
translation.zh: 只要一块钱

translation.en: Auntie, uncle, miss Can you buy my tissue paper, please?
translation.zh: 阿姨、叔叔、小姐 请买我的纸巾 好吗？

translation.en: One dollar, one dollar Hello, one dollar
translation.zh: 只要一块钱 你好 只要一块钱

translation.en: Brother, sister, little brother Please buy some tissue paper
translation.zh: 兄弟、姐妹、小朋友 请买我的纸巾 好吗？

translation.en: One dollar, one dollar Hello, one dollar
translation.zh: 只要一块钱 你好 只要一块钱

translation.en: Auntie, uncle, miss Please buy some tissue paper
translation.zh: 阿姨、叔叔、小姐 请买我的纸巾 好吗？

translation.en: One dollar, one dollar Hello, one dollar
translation.zh: 只要一块钱 你好 只要一块钱

translation.en: Auntie, uncle, miss Please buy some tissue paper
translation.zh: 阿姨、叔叔、小姐 请买我的纸巾 好吗？

translation.en: One dollar, one dollar Hello, one dollar
translation.zh: 只要一块钱 你好 只要一块钱

translation.en: All right. Here is Charlee!
translation.zh: 查理来了！

translation.en: Everybody say, "Hello, Charlee."
translation.zh: 大家说：“查理 你好！”

translation.en: Hello, Charlee!
translation.zh: 查理 你好！

translation.en: -Can you hear that? -Cannot.
translation.zh: -你听到吗？ -没听到

translation.en: You know, Charlee, you've been around for 50 years,
translation.zh: 查理 你已有五十年的表演生涯了

translation.en: performing first with my dad, and then, with me.
translation.zh: 你原来是和我的父亲一道表演 然后再和我一道表演

translation.en: -Correct. Long time. -I know.
translation.zh: -很久了 -我知道

translation.en: Tell me, through the years, how have the kids changed over 50 years?
translation.zh: 告诉我 这五十年来小孩有改变吗？

translation.en: -You know something? -What?
translation.zh: -你知道吗？ -什么？

translation.en: -Fifty years, lots of things have changed. -Correct.
translation.zh: -这五十年很多东西都有改变 -没错

translation.en: But, you know, children, over 50 years, they have not changed.
translation.zh: 但是小孩却始终没有改变

translation.en: -You can speak 36 languages? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你能说36种语言？ -是的

translation.en: -Can I test you now? -Why?
translation.zh: -给你一个测验好吗？ -为什么？

translation.en: -Show everybody how clever you are. -All right.
translation.zh: -要让大家知道你有多聪明啊 -好的

translation.en: How to you say "thank you" in Chinese?
translation.zh: 你怎么用华语说 “Thank You”？

translation.en: How to say "How are you" in Chinese?
translation.zh: 怎么用华语说 “How are you”？

translation.en: -I teach you some nice Malay words. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我来教你一些马来语 -好

translation.en: -You follow me. -Okay.
translation.zh: -你跟着我说 -好

translation.en: Tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚

translation.en: Tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚

translation.en: I meet many friends.
translation.zh: 我遇见了很多朋友

translation.en: I meet many animals.
translation.zh: 我遇见了很多动物

translation.en: I can tell the same jokes for 50 years,
translation.zh: 我可以五十年都说同样的笑话

translation.en: and different kids still laugh at the same jokes.
translation.zh: 我可以五十年都说同样的笑话 而不同的儿童还是会笑

translation.en: One, two, three, sing.
translation.zh: 一 二 三 唱

translation.en: A, B, C, D, E, F, G
translation.zh: A B C D E F G

translation.en: H, I, J, K, L, M, N, O, P
translation.zh: H I J K L M N O P

translation.en: Q, R, S, T, U, V
translation.zh: O R S T U V

translation.en: W, X, Y and Z
translation.zh: W X Y Z

translation.en: I will remember my A-B-C
translation.zh: 我记得ABC

translation.en: Now you must give me candy
translation.zh: 糖果快拿来

translation.en: You must hold the ball like this
translation.zh: 你只能这样握着球

translation.en: You are not supposed to hold the ball like that, okay?
translation.zh: 不能那样

translation.en: You can only hold the ball like this.
translation.zh: 要正确握着球

translation.en: If you hold the ball like this, I will have to stop you, okay?
translation.zh: 如果你这样握着球 你就犯规

translation.en: All right? So, please hold the ball properly, okay?
translation.zh: 要正确握着球

translation.en: Don't fumble.
translation.zh: 不要失误

translation.en: You concentrate on your ball, okay? Straight.
translation.zh: 专心握着球

translation.en: -Who's gonna win? -Red! -Who's gonna win? -Red!
translation.zh: -谁将是冠军？ -红队！

translation.en: We are, we are Champion, Champion!
translation.zh: 我们是冠军 冠军！

translation.en: We are, we are Champion, Champion!
translation.zh: 我们是冠军 冠军！

translation.en: Red House, Red House, Champion, Champion!
translation.zh: 红队 冠军！

translation.en: Red House, Red House, Champion, Champion!
translation.zh: 红队 冠军！

translation.en: Thunder, thunder, thunderation
translation.zh: 霹雳 霹雳 霹雳

translation.en: We are the Blue House dedication
translation.zh: 我们是致力于胜利的蓝队

translation.en: When we strive for determination
translation.zh: 我们努力 决心取胜

translation.en: We create a new sensation
translation.zh: 创造一种新的感觉

translation.en: Thunder, thunder, thunderation
translation.zh: 霹雳 霹雳 霹雳

translation.en: We are the Blue House dedication
translation.zh: 我们是致力于胜利的蓝队

translation.en: So let us rejoice
translation.zh: 让我们欢庆

translation.en: While we are young
translation.zh: 在我们年轻的岁月

translation.en: So let us rejoice
translation.zh: 让我们欢庆

translation.en: While we are young
translation.zh: 在我们年轻的岁月

translation.en: After the pleasant youth
translation.zh: 在愉快的青春期之后

translation.en: After the annoying old age
translation.zh: 在苦恼的老年期之后

translation.en: We shall live in the soil
translation.zh: 我们将回归土地

translation.en: We shall live in the soil
translation.zh: 我们将回归土地

translation.en: We just liked the song, that's all.
translation.zh: 我们就是喜欢这首歌曲

translation.en: In those days, when we sang, we just enjoyed the song.
translation.zh: 喜欢唱这首歌

translation.en: It reminds us of the days when--
translation.zh: 它令我们想起过去的时光

translation.en: Actually, for myself, we didn't quite know the meaning.
translation.zh: 我其实不是很明白歌词的意义

translation.en: The implications and meaning.
translation.zh: 歌词的含义

translation.en: But we just like the rhythm.
translation.zh: 就是喜欢歌曲的节奏

translation.en: Had only our music teacher still been alive,
translation.zh: 如果我们的音乐老师还活着

translation.en: he would join us now.
translation.zh: 他一定会加入我们

translation.en: I could invite him to come here.
translation.zh: 我能邀请他一起来

translation.en: I left school 50 years ago. Fifty years ago.
translation.zh: 我50年前离校

translation.en: Today is my 50th anniversary.
translation.zh: 今年是我的50周年

translation.en: The time frame of four minutes and 33 seconds,
translation.zh: 4分33秒

translation.en: is purely an artificial parameter.
translation.zh: 这个期限仅仅是一个人造的参数

translation.en: So, in that period of time, we can concentrate
translation.zh: 在这个期限内 我们能够集中于

translation.en: and listen to the music of the environment,
translation.zh: 聆听我们周围环境的音乐

translation.en: which is constantly ongoing. It never ceases and it's continually varied.
translation.zh: 这音乐是持续不断的 但却千变万化的

translation.en: We never listen to the environment.
translation.zh: 我们从不聆听我们的环境

translation.en: We are too busy listening to the thoughts in our head.
translation.zh: 我们总是忙于听我们脑里的思潮

translation.en: Doors closing.
translation.zh: 门将要关了

translation.en: Next stop, Tanjong Pagar.
translation.zh: 下一站 丹戎巴葛站

translation.en: Outram Park interchange.
translation.zh: 欧南园站换乘

translation.en: Potong Pasir is "Potong Pasir." Right?
translation.zh: 波东巴西就是这么读的 对吗？

translation.en: Bedok I would say "Bedok."
translation.zh: 勿洛也就这么读

translation.en: I don't think anybody else would say it differently.
translation.zh: 我想任何人都这么来读

translation.en: Clementi is "Clementi."
translation.zh: 金文泰就是这么来读

translation.en: Yeah. How would you say it in Singlish?
translation.zh: 用新加坡式英语怎么读？

translation.en: -Clementi. -Clementi.
translation.zh: 克莱蒙蒂 克莱蒙蒂

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: Lavender, I don't go with the Singlish way of saying "Lavender."
translation.zh: 我不会用新加坡式英语来读劳明达

translation.en: It's "Lavender."
translation.zh: 正确读法是“Lavender”

translation.en: I did attend Raffles Girls' School,
translation.zh: 我是莱佛士女中的毕业生

translation.en: and we had a principal at that time there, and she was a stickler for us speaking perfect English.
translation.zh: 我们当时的校长 非常强调正确的英语发音

translation.en: There's no way that you could go wrong with that kind of training.
translation.zh: 经过那种培训的学生的发音 一定是标准的

translation.en: The station Queenstown seems a bit muffled.
translation.zh: 女皇镇地铁站的读法似乎有点模糊

translation.en: And I keep telling myself, "That's something I got to re-do."
translation.zh: 我老提醒自己要重新录制

translation.en: I mean, I want to be recognized by the industry,
translation.zh: 我希望得到本行的认可

translation.en: but not by the passengers, the everyday passenger. No. There's no need to.
translation.zh: 但我并不需要日常的搭客认识我

translation.en: It's good for them to know there's a voice that comes on air and tells them, gives them instructions and all that.
translation.zh: 他们知道有个播音员 在必要时会给他们指示就够了

translation.en: Your attention, please. Eating or drinking is not allowed in the stations and trains.
translation.zh: 请注意 请不要在地铁站和车厢内吃喝东西

translation.en: Thank you for keeping the stations and trains clean
translation.zh: 为了其他乘客的舒适

translation.en: for the comfort of all passengers.
translation.zh: 请保持地铁站和车厢的清洁 谢谢

translation.en: Wait here, I'll call you. When bus comes, I'll call you.
translation.zh: 在这里等 公交车到了我会通知你

translation.en: This is not my bus. My bus is behind.
translation.zh: 这不是我的公交车 我的公交车在后头

translation.en: New KaiMiu Radio Station. 95 FM.
translation.zh: FM95 新KaiMiu广播电台

translation.en: We are broadcasting our news program.
translation.zh: 我们为您播报新闻

translation.en: Prime Minster and and Minster for Finance, Lee Hsien Loong
translation.zh: 总理和财政部长李显龙

translation.en: announced the budget of 2005.
translation.zh: 公布2005年财政预算

translation.en: The main subjects include the beneficial treatments to individuals
translation.zh: 公布2005年财政预算 主要议题包括针对个人以及企业的

translation.en: and the entreprises.
translation.zh: 有利政策

translation.en: Singapore Tourism Board will in 3 years
translation.zh: 旅游局将在未来的三年内

translation.en: pump $40 million to upgrade Orchard Road
translation.zh: 投资四千万元重新发展乌节路

translation.en: From 1 April, buyers of resale flats
translation.zh: 从四月一号起 购买政府组屋的公众

translation.en: must use a government appointed valuer.
translation.zh: 从四月一号起 购买政府组屋的公众 必须使用建屋发展局批准的估价员

translation.en: The government will provide Singaporeans with Medisave
translation.zh: 政府将为新加坡公民 填补公积金的健保户头

translation.en: ranging from $50 to $350 top ups.
translation.zh: 数额为50元至350元

translation.en: Retirement accounts of those aged above 50, as well as,
translation.zh: 五十岁以上人士的公积金退休户头

translation.en: primary and secondary students' Edusave accounts will get $100.
translation.zh: 以及中小学生的教育户头 将填补一百元

translation.en: Horse betting tax will be reduced from 25% to 12%.
translation.zh: 赛马赌税将从25%的税款 减到20%的税款

translation.en: So the Turf Club can offer punters better odds at a cheaper price.
translation.zh: 通过此政策 马会将可为顾客 以较低的价格提供较好的几率

translation.en: There are 377 bush fires this year.
translation.zh: 今年已经发生了377起 灌木丛着火事件

translation.en: This is a national record
translation.zh: 打破了历来最高的记录

translation.en: Father Kang must pay legal costs.
translation.zh: 康神父必须支付所有堂费

translation.en: This is the end of the news.
translation.zh: 新闻报告完毕

translation.en: Father Kang must pay legal costs.
translation.zh: 康神父必须支付所有堂费

translation.en: This is the end of the news.
translation.zh: 新闻报告完毕

translation.en: Father Kang must pay legal costs.
translation.zh: 康神父必须支付所有堂费

translation.en: This is the end of the news.
translation.zh: 新闻报告完毕

translation.en: Father Kang must pay all legal costs.
translation.zh: 康神父必须支付所有堂费

translation.en: This is the end of the news.
translation.zh: 新闻报告完毕

translation.en: This is the end of the news.
translation.zh: 新闻报告完毕

translation.en: At that time, it was a toy, not an instrument.
translation.zh: （钢琴）

translation.en: Now, I am not a recorder player at all.
translation.zh: 我不是一个直笛演奏家

translation.en: I've never really liked the instrument myself.
translation.zh: 我向来都不太喜欢这种乐器

translation.en: But it became, I think, the instrument of choice because
translation.zh: 但是我们的儿童别无选择

translation.en: the people in the extracurricular,
translation.zh: 因为教育部负责课外活动的

translation.en: now called co-curricular department of the Ministry of Education, felt
translation.zh: 因为教育部负责课外活动的 部门 觉得每一个学生都有一双手

translation.en: that every child has two hands,
translation.zh: 觉得每一个学生都有一双手

translation.en: and therefore, they can use their fingers and blow.
translation.zh: 因此可以吹直笛

translation.en: And by movement of fingers they could get these notes.
translation.zh: 并利用手指吹出这些音符

translation.en: Even I would have difficulty hitting the right notes
translation.zh: 连我都觉得有困难吹出正确的音符

translation.en: because the air pressure has to be equal to the sound.
translation.zh: 因为气压必须和声音相对称

translation.en: Low notes, you blow slower, you know,
translation.zh: 低音阶吹得慢一点

translation.en: and something like that.
translation.zh: 就像这样

translation.en: And to ask children to play with this, they always will hit, for the low C…
translation.zh: 让小孩学习直笛 他们一般要吹低C音阶时都这么做

translation.en: Mind you, the low C, the hardest note.
translation.zh: 提醒你 低C音阶是最难的

translation.en: The moment you do a bit too much, you get…
translation.zh: 吹得稍微大力一点

translation.en: You get the high octave.
translation.zh: 音阶就太高

translation.en: And worse still, if you blow too much…
translation.zh: 越大力就越糟糕

translation.en: I do know children,
translation.zh: 我了解儿童的想法

translation.en: and if you spoke to them, they will tell you this,
translation.zh: 我了解儿童的想法 你若问他们 他们就会告诉你同样的话

translation.en: exactly what I am saying.
translation.zh: 你若问他们 他们就会告诉你同样的话

translation.en: That they didn't really enjoy playing this instrument,
translation.zh: 他们确实不喜欢这种乐器

translation.en: but they had to, It was part of their music class,
translation.zh: 因为是音乐课的一部分 所以迫不得已

translation.en: and they did their best with it.
translation.zh: 他们只能尽力了

translation.en: Our leaders were probably people who had their music education either in Europe or in England.
translation.zh: 我们的领导层可能是在欧洲或英国 接受音乐训练的人

translation.en: You see? There were some who went to France, there were some who went to UK.
translation.zh: 有的到法国 有的到英国

translation.en: And if you had gone to either France or UK, this was probably used in schools.
translation.zh: 法国和英国的学校里可能就是用直笛

translation.en: And so, they copied the idea from the British.
translation.zh: 因此他们就抄袭英国人的做法

translation.en: I would think so, you see?
translation.zh: 我是这么猜测的

translation.en: Whereas we should have taken the idea from China.
translation.zh: 其实我们应该向中国学习

translation.en: Long, long, long ago, harmonicas were imported in Singapore.
translation.zh: 很久以前 新加坡就已经开始进口口琴

translation.en: And they could have been considered for use.
translation.zh: 原来能考虑使用口琴

translation.en: Unfortunately…
translation.zh: 可是很不幸地…

translation.en: I chose "Chooks" because it's my 21st century tribute
translation.zh: 我选择《鸡》 这是我在21世纪 贡献给我儿童时候的面条小贩的作品

translation.en: to the noodle seller of my childhood.
translation.zh: 这是我在21世纪 贡献给我儿童时候的面条小贩的作品

translation.en: And you see why, right?
translation.zh: 你能了解为什么 对吗？

translation.en: Remember when the boy used to come ahead?
translation.zh: 记得以前卖面条的小伙子吗？

translation.en: The little assistant would come ahead of the noodle seller and he's have his…
translation.zh: 卖面条的小贩的小助手 会走在前头 这么来敲竹子

translation.en: There was also the scrap dealer,
translation.zh: 那时还有旧货商

translation.en: and there was also this wonderful scissor grinder who would come around.
translation.zh: 还有很棒的磨剪刀的小贩

translation.en: And I still remember his cry which was something like…
translation.zh: 我还记得他的叫卖声

translation.en: And he would sing it in a very rhythmic way.
translation.zh: 他会很有节奏地唱

translation.en: And all this is something that I think children today,
translation.zh: 他会很有节奏地唱 现在的小孩根本不懂这些

translation.en: have absolutely no experience of.
translation.zh: 现在的小孩根本不懂这些

translation.en: I want to tell the world
translation.zh: 我要来歌颂

translation.en: My Jesus is good to me
translation.zh: 我的耶稣对我真好

translation.en: He takes away my troubles
translation.zh: 他拿走我的烦恼

translation.en: Let me smile to him
translation.zh: 让我向他微笑

translation.en: My jesus is good to me

translation.en: …say, "Charlee"
translation.zh: 我们一起说“查理”

translation.en: Charlee!
translation.zh: 查理！

translation.en: If you are happy And you know it, say "Charlee"
translation.zh: 查理！ 如果你感到快乐 你就说“查理”

translation.en: Charlee!
translation.zh: 查理！

translation.en: If you are happy and you know it Then I'll really know you love me
translation.zh: 如果你感到快乐

translation.en: If you are happy And you know it, say "Charlee"
translation.zh: 如果你感到快乐 你就说“查理”

translation.en: Charlee!
translation.zh: 查理！

translation.en: Charlee, you have been performing with me for 23 years, traveling all over the world.
translation.zh: 查理 你已经陪伴我 在世界各地表演了23年

translation.en: I have actually lost count of the number of shows we've performed together.
translation.zh: 我已经无法记得我们表演的次数了

translation.en: I have not.
translation.zh: 我记得

translation.en: -You have not? -Not.
translation.zh: -你还记得？ -我记得

translation.en: How many shows have we performed together?
translation.zh: 我们共同表演了多少场戏？

translation.en: Thirty-two thousand eight hundred and eighty-eight.
translation.zh: 三万两千八百八十八

translation.en: No. Just kidding.
translation.zh: 我在开玩笑！

translation.en: All right. After 50 years performing,
translation.zh: 经过50年的表演生涯

translation.en: what would you like to say to all Singaporeans? All right.
translation.zh: 你有什么想对所有新加坡人说的吗？

translation.en: I've been around for 50 years.
translation.zh: 我已经表演了50年

translation.en: Even older than Singapore.
translation.zh: 我的年纪比新加坡还要大

translation.en: All of you know me.
translation.zh: 人人都认识我

translation.en: In fact, I am to Singaporeans, what Mickey Mouse is to Americans.
translation.zh: 美国人有米老鼠 新加坡人有我

translation.en: So, why is it that after 50 years of being a true Singaporean,
translation.zh: 当了50年的忠诚新加坡人之后

translation.en: I have never received my National Day Service award? Why?
translation.zh: 为什么我没有获得 国庆日服务奖章呢？

translation.en: Let's give Charlee a big hand!
translation.zh: 让我们给查理鼓掌吧！

translation.en: Charlee!
translation.zh: 让我们给查理鼓掌吧！ 查理！

translation.en: Charlee!
translation.zh: 查理！

translation.en: Here they come!
translation.zh: 他们来了！

translation.en: -Stand up -Stand up -Stand up -Stand up for Singapore
translation.zh: -奋起 -奋起为新加坡！

translation.zh: 奋起

translation.zh: 好啦！

translation.zh: 挥霍的日子 虚度的岁月
